website_summaries.verdict: Cuts through both soft and sturdy material and is also  laser-friendly.
pros: Brings your Pinterest favorites to life after simply viewing a few videos and instructional tutorials
Works with and without computers, and can cut both plastic and vinyl
Great for industrial work just as much as it is for at-home crafts
cons: Customers note the product would be even better with a direct customer service team

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this less than a day and already made a few vinyl decals and a Heat transfer vinyl. Its super easy to use but obviously i have just touched the surface of what all this machine can do. Well worth the money. Only thing is the mats don’t seem to last long and the paper from the vinyl stuck to the mat pretty bad the first few times I tried to cut. Other than that this machine is freakin awesome.
customer_reviews.author: D. Condy

customer_reviews.title: awesome machine... easy to use.. arrived super fast!
customer_reviews.text: Love it... easy set up... well made.... Much nicer than my cricut... arrived fast and I have used it numerous times since. I ordered the wifi card which makes using this even easier with the Canvas program.... I would highly recommend it.... I love that it scans your paper ahead of time so you don't have to guess where to put your patterns to cut.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine
customer_reviews.text: I am a 20+ years purchaser of Brother. Love this machine!!! I have been waiting for awhile and it was worth it. Forget everything you know about other cutting machines. The language does not transfer. Brother speaks( writes) in an almost prgrammer's language. Please note I wrote ALMOST. Don't let that scare you. WATCH THE TUTORIALS. Take a deep breath and just remember , you can't mess it up. HAVE FUN !!! I am.
customer_reviews.author: ndebes

customer_reviews.title: So excited to use my Brother CM350 ScanNCut 2!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a couple months ago and have used it some, will be using it more as I'm learning all the wonderful things you can do with this. There are great youtube videos with how-to's for just about anything you can think of doing. There are support groups on facebook that will answer your questions and offer support for every skill level. I'm excited to really get time to create and use my Brother ScanNCut2. So great that you don't have to purchase extra dies or design cartridges for this. Online software for making your own creations is free.
customer_reviews.author: dablmc

customer_reviews.title: Cuts fabric like butter!
customer_reviews.text: Great machine --- tons of fun! The first time I used it, I cut 104 leaves out of fabric for a quilt, and it was very fast and easy. I have used Cricut and Sizzix machines, but after using this Brother ScanNCut I would never go back to any other brand. I love the ability to scan in a picture in full color and cut it out with or without a border! Too much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Hrabik

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME machine!!
customer_reviews.text: I can't love this machine any more than I do. I have 2 Cricuts, that I love, but this machine does everything I need it to. It arrived super quick and it was very easy to set up and use. I was on the fence about whether I really needed this machine, but I am super happy I bought it. I has made my stamping/cardmaking easier.
customer_reviews.author: Anissa L. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Mat was warped on arrival
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what it's supposed to, as I have owned one before, I was ready to use it right out of the box. HOWEVER, the mat that was included is permanently curved and paper will not adhere smoothly over the bump. The paper pops up and jams the cutting head. I can't cut anything on this mat. My other mat with my first machine did not have this problem; suspect this product was stored in extreme heat for a while and it affected the plastic mat. Had to purchase two more mats, which arrived in a flat box so they're good to go. I'd give the product 5 stars except for this mat problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love
customer_reviews.text: Thrilled with possibilities as soon as I took it out of the box. Did watch some you tube videos to help me get started. Haven't connected to my computer yet. It is doing everything I want without the computer connection. I stamp and color designs for card making and scrapbooking and rather than fussy cutting I now let the ScanNCut do that work for me. Love, Love, Love It
customer_reviews.author: Linda Moncrief

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I had heard so many good things about this machine, but I was very disappointed when I actually tried to use it. The concept is great, but in reality it will only scan patterns or shapes that have a high contrast between the item and the background. I called Brother and was told that in that case I would need to trace around the item with a fine black marker so the machine could "see" it. I told them that kind of defeated the purpose of the scanning function, huh? I get better results with my Silhouette Cameo even if it does take an extra step or two. The ScanNCut has been returned.
customer_reviews.author: LookingForSolutions

customer_reviews.title: great die cutting machine
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use to replace using dies to cut out my stamps. It works wonderfully. Clean cuts and very easy to use. I bought this from Amazon Warehouse so I got it a bit cheaper. BUT.....buyer beware. My machine was untouched but someone actually bought the machine took the mat that came with the machine out and put their old glittered, cut up mat in the box and returned it. Seriously, this person spent over $200 to get a new machine sent to them so they could get a new mat for free. Totally shady. Other than the mat being used the machine itself is fantastic! I wish I'd gotten it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Poppycock

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and so lightweight I can carry it ...
customer_reviews.text: This machine has changed my life. first, I don't have to buy dies ever again and I can use my own artwork in my crafting, easy to use and so lightweight I can carry it anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: debbiek

customer_reviews.title: Machine not working the money I paid
customer_reviews.text: The roller on the right side is not taking in n causing it to shift the mat n making it cut wrong very disappointed cause I've only have it for 7months I have a sewing machine for 10 yrs n it still wks I have a printer that works now for 6 yrs. I love brothers but I don't no about this I'm now thinking I want a cricut but I hope not
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Came late can’t figure out how to use , not began er friendly
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Beware of this machine
customer_reviews.text: I bought this machine and had to return everything I bought for it and the machine. It does not cut will fabric the mat lost its sticky ness after the third us. Did not try anything else since I was so upset with my purchase I did a lot of research on YouTube and internet but fell for this that didn’t work. And I have to say all my sewing machines are Brothers and I love them, but this item I think they have to make more work with it for it to work better.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Green

customer_reviews.title: Love this cutting machine! Scans, cuts and writes/draws!
customer_reviews.text: Wow I bought this as an open box item and had no idea how much I would use it. With a learning curve it worked right out the box. Someone had used it previously and cut into the mat but not to the point it couldn’t be used. I make stencils, vinyl decals, HTV iron on for shirts, signs for weddings, and clothing and other things. It also cuts material, quilters love it. You can scan an image and cut it out to the shape or outline. Truly awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi SC

customer_reviews.title: Saving $$$ on dies!
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to this machine, I no longer purchase dies. Now all that money I would have spent on matching dies, I can just get more of my favorite stamp sets. Definitely worth it! Also, if you are into masking your stamped images, this is perfect as it will cut your stamped images to the black line of your stamps without leaving that white space like dies do.
customer_reviews.author: Skeeter

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTED..
customer_reviews.text: DISAPPOINTED...Received my Brother Scanncut2 Friday. The items that were to be included were One standard mat. One cutting blade, 1 blade holder, drawing pen holder, 2 pens, tools to remove items from mat, stylus, and small storage pouch. I DID NOT receive the drawing pen holder, 2 pens, tools to remove items from mat, stylus, and small storage pouch. Only received the mat, blade and blade holder.
customer_reviews.author: WenWoo

customer_reviews.title: Not working as it should!
customer_reviews.text: I am having trouble getting the machine to only scan the outline. It wants to scan and cut some parts of the inside as well. Have tried so many things, direct cut and scan to cut data but all to no avail! Has anyone had this problem and if so how did you solve the issue?
customer_reviews.author: My reviews

customer_reviews.title: Great except networking function costs extra even though it's built in.
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!!! It's nice for small projects. It's also great for saving material. You can place and size your cuts according to the piece of vinyl you have. I've cut several hundred pieces and I am still on my original blade. Machine has been flawless. Only complaint is the requirement to pay in order to activate the wireless/internet function that's already built in.
customer_reviews.author: CrimsonOgre

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have a Cricut and love it. The scan and cut goes announce and beyond what a Cricut does. I am excited to use it. It is a great compliment to my creating team of the Cuttlebug and Cricut. I am in awe at how intricate it can cut
customer_reviews.author: CMW

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Product
customer_reviews.text: had almost two months & still not able to get a good end result / wasting money & wasted money on purchasing this product / I wanted a Brother Sewing Machine but since this easy scan & cut isn't working out for me I will not purchase anything that is a Brother /
customer_reviews.author: Ginger V.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife. She loves it! Having read about the many things that thus machine can do. She has been printing and scanning things into it for our sons. It has a learning curve and is something that has to be researched too. I would recommend watching videos and learning how to do things. That is what she has done and is very pleased with the results and the machine itself.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan H Wilson

customer_reviews.title: the cutting machine comes incomplete parts.
customer_reviews.text: the cutting machine comes incomplete without as important parts as Cut Blade Holder although in the instructions of manufacturer says that includes these parts. I live in another country and they can not help me in any way. Regrettable.
customer_reviews.author: Geovanna Izurieta

customer_reviews.title: I love, love
customer_reviews.text: Before purchasing the ScanNCut I wondered how much use would it actually be. It turns out that I am constantly finding uses for it. I love, love, love my machine! The scanning feature is great and so is the ability to convert any picture into a cut file. There are plenty of instructional videos available and new, free craft projects are add every month. If you are on the fence about purchasing a ScanNCut my advise is DO IT!
customer_reviews.author: Anita Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great for fussy cutting stamped images
customer_reviews.text: Love my ScanNCut. I got it to cut out stamped designs that I do not have dies for and it works great. The “operation manual” is on CD, rather than paper for easy reference while operating the machine. I chose to watch many video tutorials on YouTube to learn how to use it. I have not yet tried any functions except for direct cut. I was a little bit apprehensive about the stickiness of the mat tearing my paper, but it isn’t very sticky at all, just enough to hold my cardstock in place.
customer_reviews.author: SSS

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful machine!
customer_reviews.text: This machine is a dream for paper crafters like me, I love it! I enjoy it SO MUCH MORE than my Cricut because it's more versatile for all kinds of projects.
customer_reviews.author: Zano

customer_reviews.title: Great machine!
customer_reviews.text: Thank goodness for YouTube. The directions I caused were not great - but you tube to the rescue! I do love my scan n cut though. Totally worth the learning curve. It has made card making so much more fun! No more fussy cutting.
customer_reviews.author: kate a

customer_reviews.title: Not consistent - maybe be a lemon
customer_reviews.text: The scanning feature is the bomb when it works. I can't seem to get it to be precise consistently. Also the blade needs to be readjusted after every cut. Even with those issues it's still a better print then cut experience by comparison to other brands so I am going to try the newer model and hope for better results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This machine is AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a gift and I LOVE this machine. This will save me so much money on buying dies. You can scan and cut out printed images or scan in your own images and cut those out. The possibilities are endless with this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Lopez

customer_reviews.title: My wife's favorite new toy
customer_reviews.text: My wife's favorite new toy. She is a total scrap nut and this tool has allowed her to truly up her game on her creations, which sell on eBay and Pinterest under SWAK Scrappin
customer_reviews.author: Peter Scott

customer_reviews.title: Broken!
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this and was so excited but opened to see it was broken..and missing pieces. I purchased this on here from the seller Bargain Shack USA. I will be requesting a new one. Just be careful and aware..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too much issues, if fix would be great.
customer_reviews.text: I am returning this machine because everything that was written in regards to stickiness ran out after 2 print was true, paper slipping all over the place was true, cutter somewhat true. Overall if they can fix this problem, it would be great. Also, you must purchase some extra product to use wireless service. Wish I listened to those negatives reviews before buying. Just bought 2 days ago.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Manning

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived super fast! Excellent machine and does much more than I thought it would. Have a Cricut and this is much easier to use. Like that it is stand alone machine that does not require being connected to a computer or software. Would highly recommend for others who craft and don’t like fussy cutting or buying expensive die cuts to match stamps. Great for digital stamps!
customer_reviews.author: PookieKim

customer_reviews.title: Buy it new
customer_reviews.text: I just give the plotter and the easy use 5 stars but not for the seller! Product is not “ like new” is more or less “ fair’. Was heavy used and hairs and dirty and scratched all over. Don’t buy used!!! . To cut out vinyl decals or htv make a test cut or you cut to deeply.. setting 4-3 is maybe to much. Set blade to 2 and check.
customer_reviews.author: Monika W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, Easy to use, scan feature a must have!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing cuts & quality. This cutter works side by side with my Roland GS-24; which retail for over $1800.00 The scan functionality is a must have feature. Just starting, cutting vinyl for garments or a seasoned pro. You will find many uses for this machine. I highly recommended, great value.
customer_reviews.author: paula hyde

customer_reviews.title: Good and fun
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. I have not had any problems with the machine itself. The only problem I have had yet is the tackyness of the mats. YouTube has taught me a lot though.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome machine
customer_reviews.text: Great machine. Can be a bit overwhelming to learn. Looks a lot easier than it is. Has so many functions and uses.
customer_reviews.author: Lever

customer_reviews.title: Great but software needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: Pretty awesome machine, I don’t give 5 stars because the software is awful, I recommend to create your SVG and then transfer it to the ScannCut by usb
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Mota

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this. My 9 year old grandson watched u ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this. My 9 year old grandson watched u tube and showed me how to use it!!! I cut a whole sheet of 9 stars in around a minute! very fast and accurate!
customer_reviews.author: Flo

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!  This machine!~
customer_reviews.text: This machine is very easy to use. My mom who is not very good at electronics can easily use this machine. Cuts great! She uses it for scanning her drawings and cutting them out.
customer_reviews.author: Holly A Ekstrom

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy a refurbished unit .
customer_reviews.text: This is a great machine for light use . Easy to set up easy to use . The only problem I had was I bought a refurbished unit . Big mistake . There was no deep cut blade holder , the other blade holder came with no blade and the instructions where in Spanish. So for the money I saved I am now spending to get all the correct little parts sent to me . I have had the unit 3 days now and I have cut zero product . Note to self don’t cheap out next time but the new stuff . Now I have orders piling up and no way to cut .
customer_reviews.author: tyrone

customer_reviews.title: Super vinyl cutter
customer_reviews.text: Took me a long time to decide what I wanted in a vinyl cutter. This one hit it out of the park! Love it. Scanner and cutter. Makes it very easy. I use a thumb drive to transfer from my computer. Great tool.
customer_reviews.author: Brule Lehman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been a dream and fun. The scan n cut board for laying vinyl on n scan materials isn’t the best I bought two so far I’ve done three projects and it already worn out. The machine though is awesome and even our kids have figured it out.
customer_reviews.author: Charissa

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. It is worth it. I don’t need to buy dies for stamped images anymore.
customer_reviews.author: SSS

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your time and money with this! I spent days trying to get it to work with the internet but no good! I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: thea wqendelgest

customer_reviews.title: Great Hobby Craft Cutter
customer_reviews.text: Great machine. Does what it is supposed to do. I only use it to cut vinyl but it does a good job.
customer_reviews.author: Piano Kat

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine.
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful tool for stamping. I have yet to try all of the techniques but it is so fun to work with.
customer_reviews.author: IceyS

customer_reviews.title: I RECOMMEND IT
customer_reviews.text: It's not perfect but it's probably just me still learning how to use it :-) I love it though! Saves me a lot of time AND money on die cuts!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: I have been wanting one for over 2 years!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one for my daughter a couple of years ago for her birthday. I finally got one for myself! Now, I just have to retire so that I will have time to use it!!
customer_reviews.author: Grandmamax4

customer_reviews.title: Great for Classroom
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine! It makes creating letters and designs for bulletin boards a piece of cake! Very simple to use as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Millard

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Does not come with a manual but there are a lot of YouTube videos to watch and learn from. I love this machine for a beginner like me.
customer_reviews.author: VICKY YOUNG-OWEN

customer_reviews.title: Exciting product so useful in so many ways
customer_reviews.text: I love the potential with Scan and Cut. There is so much to do. Do find many on line sites and videos so helpful. I do not have a great deal of WiFi available so great it can be used as stand alone.
customer_reviews.author: slsochia

customer_reviews.title: love my scan-n-cut
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a year ago and I still love it as much as when I first purchased it. I have recommended it to friends and five of them have purchased it as well. The ability to cut out multiple stamped images at one time is a great time saver, and makes for easier construction of multiple projects at once. I highly recommend the SNC2.
customer_reviews.author: D I designs

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS MACHINE!
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine! I have already made a ton of vinyl decals for cups, glasses, car windows, tote bags, t-shirts, etc. This is the machine you need to do it all! I would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Alabama Catlady

customer_reviews.title: Does not cut fabric real well.
customer_reviews.text: Does not cut fabric real well, have to put it through twice, and still I have to take scissors to my fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha L. Frei

customer_reviews.title: Needs determination but I have conquered it.
customer_reviews.text: A huge learning curve needed, but slowly I am finding new tricks to make this cutting machine do what I want it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Derry Wilson

customer_reviews.title: It is wonderful and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Every day I learn something new on this. It is wonderful and easy to use. Youtube has tons of videos to help. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Rollins

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I love it, I learned how to do everything on Youtube and now I have multiple people wanting orders within my first 2 weeks!, great product easy to use my only gripe is that I wish i could use the printer cable with my macbook, small issue does not stop the process I love it glad I picked this over a Cameo
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. But cutting shape is not good. I don’t know what expect from 200$ machine. I guess it’s fine
customer_reviews.author: Vladyslav

customer_reviews.title: Great results
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. It has opened up a whole new world of crafting!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far, simple to use!
customer_reviews.text: I had no experience with any cutting system before purchasing this and I found it very easy. It did take some experimenting to figure out the right depts for different mediums- the suggested depths were too deep on mine. Overall very happy so far with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D. Cote III

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine!!! The best for quick print and cuts!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: What I dislike is that the scan mat does not stay sticky ...
customer_reviews.text: What I dislike is that the scan mat does not stay sticky long enough. After couple scan with glitter paper. The paper no longer will remain stable on the mat for cutting. (Unlike the Circuit their mats remain tacky for a very long time and many uses.)
customer_reviews.author: Patricia L. Haywood

customer_reviews.title: Overall great product!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived quickly and as described!!! I love my new Brother Scan and Cut. I'm finding out new things I can do everyday!! One thing that I have found out is that to scan, you need to buy a separate scan mat. Also, to connect wirelessly, you need the activation card, which is sold separately as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: There's a learning curve with this product, but it is worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fargo

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the CM350 to Scan N Cut stamped images for my paper crafting classes!
customer_reviews.author: CRice

customer_reviews.title: This is so much fun. You don't need a computer to cut out ...
customer_reviews.text: This is so much fun. You don't need a computer to cut out beautiful images! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Warner246

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great way to cut out stamped items that don't have a punch or framelit / thinlits.
customer_reviews.author: PATRICIA PARISH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this machine. It was easy to get started, and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Product is good
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great cutter but sometimes it will go wrong. It’s not bad but not great. But it works for its purpose. I really don’t like when the adhesive wears out but it is what it is. I still like this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nalie

customer_reviews.title: so good. I am having fun with this
customer_reviews.text: so far, so good. I am having fun with this.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: You will need a teacher but when you learn to program it it works well
customer_reviews.text: Very long learning time with inadequate directions. Needed someone to help me learn it and even she can’t do all the things the machine is capable of
customer_reviews.author: Candace Purdy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent machine !! Easy to use Thank you brothers!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent machine !! Easy to use Thank you brothers, delivery really quick and easy to operate arrived Excellent brothers you make perfect products !!!
customer_reviews.author: eran m.

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my Cricut to do rhinestones and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Taunya Smith

customer_reviews.title: Works fine to cut paper
customer_reviews.text: Works fine to cut paper. Not that impressive cutting fabric, especially felt. Didn't yield a clean finish even with the extra sticky pad purchased for felt cutting. Paper cardstock did have a clean finish, although few times had to punch it out and tear off a very small piece. Tricky to play with settings as too much of a deep cut would cut through the board and ended up taping the back. There aren't too many selections of shapes and fonts that the machine comes with.
customer_reviews.author: Starla

customer_reviews.title: Good product - must learn to use it.
customer_reviews.text: I have only done a few quick projects and have learned from each one. YouTube is your friend. Read your manual.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but I really think I'm going to like this machine
customer_reviews.text: Still learning, but I really think I'm going to like this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Tammie

customer_reviews.title: Love the machine
customer_reviews.text: Love the machine. Not happy about the lack of information on what USB cabe it needs to avoid having to purchase the online activation card.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda LeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this for so long... I can’t believe how easy it was to use. I was cutting images 10 minutes after opening the box.
customer_reviews.author: Izabela Mniszak

customer_reviews.title: Limited  without the card
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product but has limited scope without the card.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy

customer_reviews.title: Scans and cuts
customer_reviews.text: Love my machine! This machine makes my cutting much easier.
customer_reviews.author: KAREN DE LOS REYES

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine. Does everything I needed it to do
customer_reviews.author: Dee S.

customer_reviews.title: best buy ever
customer_reviews.text: I love doing arts and crafts, This machine as stepped up my game. I can't stop using it.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Dancy

customer_reviews.title: NOT pleased at all with this machine
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my scan n cut in July of 2017. I has been used about 10 times total and today I called tech support only to find out that I need to take it to a service center because there is a problem with the machine software. NOT pleased at all with this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Ott

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I use this machine for a large variety of things
customer_reviews.author: Shirlrus

customer_reviews.title: CUSTOM cuts and scan feature, NO ONLINE SOFTWARES NEEDED
customer_reviews.text: This thing is sooooo champ! You don’t need a online software. You can scan your own drawings and make stencils !
customer_reviews.author: PRIMO

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed in this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed in this purchase. Not user friendly. Tutorials are not real helpful.Wish I had returned - too late now
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This machine is incredible!
customer_reviews.text: This paper cutter can take paper and a lot of other things and create artistic pop up cards and books. It is one of the first available machines available to the public that can do this! I hope they keep building on the technology and patterns to use although you can use and create your own patterns!
customer_reviews.author: Eric in Portland

customer_reviews.title: ... to cut out poker chip labels and it works great for what I need
customer_reviews.text: I bought this scan n cut machine to cut out poker chip labels and it works great for what I need. Only drawback is with the tacky pad, the pad loses its stickiness very, very quickly and the pads are expensive. I was able to use scotch tape which seems to work but be aware of the pad issue.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: One of my best investments
customer_reviews.text: What a great machine. I am loving my new ScanNCut 2 and the projects I am now able to do with it. Customer support and projects help sites are very good. There are many free files available and the scanncutcanvas program is very user friendly. The only downside I have found is none of my local stores carry accessories for the machine. Since they all carry the machine via their .com sites I was hoping to find replacement blades, mats and maybe kits available in the stores. Unfortunately Hobby Lobby, Michael's, JoAnn Fabrics and Walmart do not carry accessories. Maybe one day. :) Nonetheless, you can't go wrong with this machine.

customer_reviews.title: Great machine but mat sucks.
customer_reviews.text: I love the machine. Very easy to use. Only complaint is the mat that comes with the machine is not sticky enough to hold anything. After two uses and I need to buy a new one. I own a Cricut and the mats are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary

product_meta.title: Brother CM350 Electronic Cutting Machine, Scanncut2, 4.85” LCD Touch Screen, Wireless Network Ready, 300 DPI Scanner, 631 Built-in Designs
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Previous Model: CM350

Developed with the advanced, cutting-edge technology that Brother is known for, ScanNCut2 is truly an incredible innovation in electronic cutting machines. This standalone cutting machine gives artists the freedom to make truly unique, one-of-a-kind creations with the push of a button. The Brother CM350 ScanNCut2 provides users with the flexibility of connecting wirelessly or directly to a PC and scanning images directly to the system, and it features a large cutting area to cut and draw a variety of shapes and designs with precision.

The Brother CM350 home and hobby cutting machine does not require cartridges, dyes, or monthly subscriptions and includes multiple built-in features that simplify the process. Unlike other cutting machines, the Brother ScanNCut2 allows you to scan virtually anything – from your handmade drawings to cherished family photos, home decor designs, and more – and then create custom-cut shapes or outlines to fit your unique project. The Brother ScanNCut2 machine features a high-quality, built-in 300 DPI scanner, a super-large 4.85” LCD touchscreen display (30% larger than before), and over 600 designs. It also has the ability to read SVG data files.

The on-screen editing function allows users to edit designs on the LCD touchscreen. The Brother ScanNCut2 also features 631 built-in designs, including 100 quilt patterns and 7 lettering fonts. The ScanNCut online feature allows you to connect wirelessly to transfer cut data to and from the ScanNCut2 machine via ScanNCutCanvas. (An optional WLAN activation card is required to access this feature). This product is backed by a 1-year limited warranty with free technical phone support for the life of the product.
feature_bullets: 300 DPI Built in Scanner: The ScanNCut2 Machine Allows You to Turn Your Scanned Images Into Unique Cut Designs and Patterns
Large Color Touchscreen: The Brother ScanNCut2 CM350 Includes a 4.85 Inches LCD Touchscreen That Allows Users to Easily Select Functions
Wireless Network Ready: The CM350 Permits Multiple Connectivity Options, Including PC Connectivity and Standalone or Wireless Network Connectivity
Large Scanning and Cutting Area: Use the Included 12 Inches x 12 Inches Cutting Mat or Upgrade to a Larger Mat to Create and Cut a Wide Variety of Designs
On Screen Editing: The Brother CM350 allows users to edit designs easily on the LCD touchscreen; Compatible operating systems: Microsoft Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8/Windows 8.1, Windows 10

Refer instructional manual before use; Welding Use the welding feature to combine shapes, hand drawings, fonts, and more directly on screen; Combine detailed or intricate cuts in seconds to simply group designs in one piece prior to cutting

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars671 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
